entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 10:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
